Address.Address1: Brandium Atasehir Alisveris Merkezidereboyu Cad , Istanbul Turkey

Description.Text: As the newest and most assertive hotel on the Anatolian side of Istanbul, the Hotel is designed according to various needs of its guests. In addition to the hotel and convention center offering both elegance and comfort, shopping, entertainment and business possibilities are waiting for the guests in theBrandium Ata?ehir which is located just next to the Hotel.
